data.description:
CALM + FLEX + ENERGIZE

Experience the benefits of body-mind exercises with your 1-on-1 mindfulness coach within your home comfort. With ReCharge XR, you get your Yoga instructor, Qigong teacher, healthy-aging coach: and more!

Reduce stress and unwind after a long day at work, improve your posture, get more energy, prepare for a good night sleep, and reduce stiff limbs.

üßò 36+ MINDFULNESS EXPERIENCES
Recharge your mind and body with 36 specially designed programs! Target specific goals with categories like stress reduction, no round back, energizing morning, daily stretch, booty pilates, and a good night's rest.

‚õ∞Ô∏è STUNNING ENVIRONMENTS
Escape to your perfect fitness haven and choose a beautifully crafted VR environment - unwind in a virtual spa, find your center in a peaceful yoga room, energize on a tropical beach, or feel luxurious in a virtual villa.

üë®‚Äçüè´ PERSONALIZED MINDFULNESS COACH
Choose and personalize your own mindfulness coach: with more than a thousand options!

üéµ RELAXING MUSIC
Featuring 10+ ambient music tracks to quickly get you into trance and relaxation; including Vagus Nerve Stimulation music that helps you to ease and bring your mind to the right frequency.

üí∏ NO SUBSCRIPTION FEES
Forget silly subscription fees! Recharge XR is all yours with a single purchase.

Open the portal to your healthier and happier inner self, and recharge after a stressful day at work.

Over 15k users have already joined, with an average cross-platform rating of 9 so far. Will you be next?
